original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevana paccayā āpattiyaḥ sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam katihi āpatti kkhandhehi saṅgahitā

original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ catūhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevana paccayā āpattiyaḥ sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam catūhi āpatti kkhandhehi saṅgahitā

original: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena …pe….
analyzed: siyā pārājika āpatti kkhandhena siyā thullaccaya āpatti kkhandhena siyā pācittiya āpatti kkhandhena siyā dukkaṭa āpatti kkhandhena pe

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karaṇa paccayā āpatti sattannam āpatti khandhānam katihi āpatti khandhehi saṅgahitā

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ ekena āpattikkhandhena saṅgahitā—
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karaṇa paccayā āpatti sattannam āpatti khandhānam ekena āpatti khandhena saṅgahitā
